FuncDef: This command configures an IP prefix within the list.

ParaDef.Info: The IP address in dotted decimal notation. Values-ipv4-prefix |a.b.c.d (host bits must be 0)|, ipv4-prefix-length|0 to 32|, ipv6-prefix|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces), |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d|, |x: |[0 to FFFF]H, |d: |[0 to 255]D, prefix-name|32 characters max|.
